page.title: 18LEISURE IN FLITWICK 1
page.content: { FLITWICK SPORTS CENTRE FLITWICK SPORTS CENTRE WAS OPENED AT THE END OF SEPTEMBER 1985. THE CENTRE IS SITUATED ON A LARGE FIELD ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE TOWN. THE BUILDING HAS A GIRDER FRAMEWORK WHICH IS COVERED WITH BRICKWORK AND A METAL CLADDING.THERE IS A LARGE SPORTS HALL, RECEPTION AREA,AN UPSTAIRS VIEWING AREA AND LOUNGE, CHANGING ROOMS ,AND A SMALL HALL,OUTSIDE THERE IS A LARGE PLAYING FIELD. INDOOR SPORTS INCLUDE 5 A SIDE FOOTBALL,SHORT TENNIS, ROLLER SKATING, BADMINTON,BASKETBALL,GYMNASTICS AND MANY OTHERS.
